"Xiandy": "Thank you for coming to see me. Allow me to introduce myself once again."
"I am Xiandy. My job is to study various strange phenomena that happen throughout Halpha."
"The reason I called you is to ask for your help with studying current ongoing phenomena."
"Lately, you see, I've noticed a spike in the number of enemies in all regions."
"There haven't been reports of any serious injuries yet, but that situation could change in the future."
"Therefore, I've been continuously analyzing the situation by gathering enemy combat data."
"Particularly regarding the enemies with peculiar symbols attached to them, which are likely related to current events."
"Would you also be able to gather some enemy data for me?"
"Rewards have been prepared for participants."
"Your help would be most appreciated."
"Thank you for coming to see me."

"Welcome back. With your help, I was able to get a lot of valuable data."
"According to this data, it seems that enemy activity has indeed become more lively."
"There's a possibility that Gold and Silver enemies are having some kind of influence on the other enemies."
"I'll need to look into things a bit more before I can say how this will develop later on."
"Thankfully, though, this phenomenon doesn't seem to pose any immediate risk."
"Still, no matter how small the change, it's important to carry out such investigations."
"<%me>. Thank you very much for your cooperation."
"I have prepared various rewards, so please let me know what you need."
"With that, if anything else comes up, I hope to be able to count on you again."
"Enemy activities are full of mystery."
"Though it might look like aimless behavior, when you look closely, there's an overall regularity to it."
